sqlMap.select: select DISTINCT * FROM bus_shipschedule t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = FALSE AND schtype = 'Q' ORDER BY yearno DESC , monthno DESC , carrier , pol , pod DESC
select count(*) AS counts FROM bus_shipschedule t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = FALSE AND schtype = 'Q'
